Paragraph "A"
There are five students S1, S2, S3, S4 and S5 in a music class and for them there are five seats R1, R2, R3, R4 and R5 arranged in a row, where initially the seat Ri is allotted to the student Si, i = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. But, on the examination day, the five students are randomly allotted the five seats.
(There are two questions based on Paragraph "A", the question given below is one of them)

It returns back to a distance ℓ from point of collision. The coefficient of restitution e is :- (Take ℓ = 1m, L = 4m, α = 37°)

Two identical rectangular rods of metal are welded end to end in series between temperature 0°C and 100°C and 10 J of heat is conducted (in steady state process) through the rod in 2.00 min. If 5 such rods are taken and joined as shown in figure maintaining the same temperature difference between A and B, then the time (in min) in which 20 J heat will flow through the rods is :-

The torsion balance shown in figure is used in an experiment to measure radiation pressure. The torque constant (elastic restoring torque) of the suspension fibre is 1 × 10–11 N-m/deg, and the length of the horizontal rod is 6 cm. The beam from a 3 mW He-Ne laser is incident on the black disc and the mirror disc is completely shielded. The angle between the equilibrium positions of the horizontal bar when the beam is switched from "off" to "on" is α × 10–2 degree. The value of α is :-

In a water supply system, horizontal nozzles are attached to the main supply pipe at regular interval of 10m. Each nozzle discharges water horizontally at the rate of 2 kg/s with velocity 5 m/s. An empty tank of mass 100 kg and length 20m is placed over smooth horizontal rails below the supply line initially at the rest. Find the velocity of the tank (in m/s) after 100 sec. Ignore vertical gap between the tank and water supply line. Water started moving with the tank as it falls in it.

In the circuit diagram a capacitor which is initially uncharged is connected to an ideal cell of emf E = 5 volt through a resistor R. A leaky dielectric fills the space between the plates of capacitor. The capacitance of capacitor with dielectric is C = 2µF. Find charge at capacitor in steady state. Resistance of dielectric is also R.

A large concave mirror with a radius of curvature of 0.5 m is placed on a horizontal plate. We pour a small amount of water into the mirror and place on it a plano-convex lens with a radius of curvature of 1.0 m whose plane side just covers the water. Then we place a point light source above this setup at a height of 0.3 m. The distance (in meters) from the object where the final image is formed will be . Find x. (Given that the refractive index of water is  and the refractive index of glass is 1.50)

A uniform electric field E is present horizontally along the paper throughout region but uniform magnetic field B0 is present horizontally (perpendicular to plane of paper in inward direction) right to the line AB as shown. A charge particle having charge q and mass m is projected vertically upward and crosses the line AB after time  seconds. Find the speed (in m/s) of projection if particle moves after t0 with constant velocity. (Given : qE = mg)
